description: Detects potential DLL injection and execution using "Tracker.exe"
author: Avneet Singh @v3t0_
oscd.community
name: Potential DLL Injection Or Execution Using Tracker.exe
query: ((((process.executable.text:*\\tracker.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Tracker")) AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \/d\ * OR *\ \/c\ *)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:*\ \/ERRORREPORT\:PROMPT\ *) OR (process.parent.executable.text:(*\\Msbuild\\Current\\Bin\\MSBuild.exe OR *\\Msbuild\\Current\\Bin\\amd64\\MSBuild.exe)))))
